title: Ben Affleck and daughter Seraphina attend karate class
title_page: Ben Affleck and daughter Seraphina attend karate class | Daily Mail Online
text:
He recently kicked Superman's butt.
So it comes as no surprise Ben Affleck wants his daughter to be able to defend herself too.
The 44-year-old was spotted leaving a karate class with his youngest girl Seraphina on Wednesday.
In training: Ben Affleck and his daughter Seraphina attended karate class together on Wednesday one day after his alcohol rehab revelation
The Batman star was having a dress down day in sneakers, black tracksuit bottoms and a retro videogame New England Patriots shirt.
With baseball cap facing backwards, he munched on an apple as he scooped his little girl from the Academy of Martial Arts.
Seraphina was dressed all in black; and while the pink bow in her hair may have looked cute, the purple belt around her waist told onlookers not to mess with her.
Despite him being a member of the Justice League and her being an eight-year-old girl, the former appeared to be pretty flushed in the face after the lesson, while the latter seemed pretty chill.

So confident in her abilities was she, she even brought along some light reading material for the class.
The book in question was JK Rowling's Harry Potter And The Order Of The Phoenix, suggesting she is more interested in Defence Against the Dark Arts, rather than self defence or martial arts.
Earlier in the day Ben was spotted having some one-on-one time with five-year-old son Samuel.

The day before, Ben revealed he recently completed treatment for alcohol addiction.
The actor and director said in a Facebook post Tuesday that it's the first of many steps toward a positive recovery.
He added that he wants to be the best father he can and show his kids there's no shame in getting help. He also thanked Jennifer Garner for supporting him and caring for their three kids, including 11-year-old Violet.
